alert.note: Alert for Morris; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 2:50PM CST until January 06 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM CST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up 1 to 2 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills 15 to 20 degrees below zero. * WHERE...Morris and Wabaunsee Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 7 AM CST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
